name: Vinh Hung Riverside Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed only 2 nights, left this morning. (Now in Hue.) The location, grounds, service and meals were all excellent. We really liked the 'food market' 4 pm - 5 pm where guests can sample local foods. Our room was pretty good, too, though just a couple of things let it down slightly, e.g. some lights didnt work, bathroom floor and tiles in shower needed a good clean. But overall very good value and highly recommended.
reviews.title: lovely relaxing place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here 4 nights as a break after 2 weeks of a 4 week holiday. Could not have been much happier. Second time in Hoi An, and this place excited us enough to already considering another stay early next year. Took a River View Room, which was large and comfortable, with a pleasant balcony and deck chairs available to watch the passing parade on the river.
reviews.title: Take a break at a great place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent pool, which was well used by everybody. The afternoon market when one can sample the local food is a great innovation, and certainly boosts bar sales, as an aside.
reviews.title: 4* star resort with 5* standards at a 3* price!

reviews.text: We ate twice in the hotel restaurant, and found the food of an excellent standard and well valued.
reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant resort

reviews.text: The staff cannot be faulted for their smiling faces and attitude, and their desire to be of assistance to guests. Management is active and interested in your opinion, and desirous of further improving the facility. Can't wait to get back.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Vinh Hung Riverside Resort is a nice place to stay. Right on the river with lots of nice relaxing places to sit and enjoy the garden/river - away from the hub-hub of town but only a short walk away. The garden view room was nice with free safe and A/C. The bathroom was dated and needs upgrade. The pool was nice - but expect famliies with young children. The best thing was the 4 PM "Country Fair" with all sorts of freshly prepared local food served in the garden for free! After that you can do with a light dinner. Free internet and free boat ride to town. The breakfast choices were okay but you get eggs or Pho made to order. Everyone spoke good English.
reviews.title: Vinh Hung Riverside Resort - very relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I also had special massages for 2 days in the Spa located on the restaurant grounds. The therapists were very good.
reviews.title: Location location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An excellent little resort right on the river edge. Staff are really attentive and were very helpful in helping me arrange a surprise for my wife's birthday. We has a river view room which was really nice with the river on one balcony and the pool right outside the front door. Daily market tasting at 4pm was very nice also. Look forward to retuning to this hotel when next in Hoi An.
reviews.title: friendliest hotel ever

reviews.text: Our first time in Vietnam and a not good start at Saigon airport where we found airport staff unfriendly and unhelpful so with some reservation we made it to Hoi An and Vinh Hung Riverside.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a revelation at this hotel. Within 2 days we were on first name terms from management down to cleaners and gardeners. All of the staff made us feel special, so much so that we were given a better room on the ground floor because the manager (Mr C) did not want us climbing 2 flights of stairs, offered complimentary dinner at the restaurant, and complimentary taxi to Da Nang airport for our onward travel! We explained to Mr C that we already had a taxi arranged and without hesitation he said then you must take a river cruise on the Thu Bon river for 2hrs instead! It was my wifes birthday while at the hotel and in the afternoon we were lazing around the pool when a member of staff arrived with a birthday cake. We have stayed at many hotels around the world but never have we been treated so royally as this. We did think at one point that the management may have confused us with someone else but no on speaking to several other guests they also had received similar treatment and also many guests are repeat customers. In conclusion We 100% recommend this hotel and also it is probably the best located in Hoi An. So to Mr C and everyone at Vinh Hung riverside a very big thank you from the Bird family.
reviews.title: Yeh pretty good

reviews.text: Stayed 6 nights. Very comfortable and just a short walk to the shops and restaurants in the old town. Pool was good. We had a Riverview room with balcony overlooking the river out the back and another balcony overlooking the pool at the front. Breakfast was good. Convenient laundry just outside the front gate. $1 per kilogram! Recommended.
reviews.title: Nice resort close to the old town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the fourth time I have stayed at the Vinh hung Riverside resort, each time there has been improvements made around the resort and the manner in which the guests are treated by all staff, I cannot praise highly enough.
reviews.title: Not just a resort but a home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The resort is in a short walking distance to town which is an amazing place to see with good food and lots of shopping but you don't need to leave the resort for good food, the restaurant at the resort is fantastic and the afternoon market at the resort is put on free so the guests can taste the local food and have an idea of what to order whether it be in town or at the resort.
reviews.title: A Special Place

reviews.text: This year I had a good talk to the general manager of the resort Ha Nguyen Han and asks him how come the resort was improving, his reply was, if the staff are happy in their jobs they work harder to make the guests happy and you can see this all over the resort.
reviews.title: Idyllic oasis in Hoi An

reviews.text: Guest relations manager Dinh Thi Lam Giang is very pleasant and works very hard to help any guest whether they have a problem or not in the resort, and somebody from the higher end of management (Mr Chan, Mr Chuong, etc ) are happy to have a talk about how your day was or help in any way they can,
reviews.title: We Love Vinh Hung Riverside Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just come back from our 13th stay at the Vinh Hung Resort and can't wait to go back again next year. This is a great hotel in a great location just a short walk to the old town. We combine our shopping with plenty of time to relax by the pool.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The manager and staff are very welcoming and treat us like family . Always ready to help with a smile. Rooms are very nice and overlook the pool area which has a swim up bar . We enjoy the breakfast and they make the best scrambled eggs.
reviews.title: We love our home in Vietnam
Just as good as I remember
reviews.text: Will be back next year. Thanks Mr Han

We have just returned from a 6 night stay atVinh Hung Riverside Resort. We have stayed there many times and whenever we go to Vietnam we always go to Hoi An and always stay here. Although there are a large number of guest rooms they are set in small groups around the main swimming pool area so guests still have plenty of privacy. The main attractions are its location being just a short stroll from the Ancient Town and the friendliness of the staff who seem to have been there for many years.
reviews.title: Accomodation
Wow.
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet has plenty of variety and the highlights are the banana crepes and the excellent omelets which the chef will make to your order. In the afternoons they have a free function in the garden by the river where you can try a variety of local foods special to this area. The bar/hospitality manager will explain the dishes and the staff are very proud to display their cooking abilities.

description: Total 17 keys. All rooms have either private balcony or veranda or terrace with the view of garden, lotus pond, pastoral scenery, or paddy fields. All rooms are non-smoking.
